amendment.description: To expend the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002.

action.text: Amendment SA 40 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 40 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 49. Record Vote Number: 14.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 40.
Amendment SA 40 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S1221-1223, S1226-1229; text: CR S1222) To expend the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 40 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 49. Record Vote Number: 14.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 40 proposed by Senator Reed.
